@graph.name: How to Create and Optimize Videos for Optizen Campaigns
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to creating high-converting videos using both custom uploads and AI generation.

tool.name: YouTube or Vimeo account (for custom videos)

step.name: Choose Video Creation Method
step.text: Decide between using existing YouTube/Vimeo videos or generating new videos with AI.

step.name: Set Up Custom Video (Option 1)
step.text: Upload your existing YouTube, Vimeo, or TikTok videos. Ensure videos are set to Public and under 60 seconds for best engagement.

step.name: Generate AI Video (Option 2)
step.text: Add your Shopify product URL to automatically extract product information and generate a professional video presentation.

step.name: Customize AI Video Settings
step.text: Choose from 240+ AI voices, select gender and avatar options, and pick the optimal aspect ratio (16:9, 9:16, or 1:1).

step.name: Save to Video Library
step.text: Click 'Save to Video Library' to reuse videos across multiple campaigns and save AI credits.

step.name: Optimize for Conversion
step.text: Focus on benefits over features, keep videos under 60 seconds, use clear call-to-actions, and highlight special offers.

mainEntity.name: What video platforms does Optizen support?

acceptedAnswer.text: Optizen supports YouTube, Vimeo, TikTok, and direct file uploads. Videos must be set to Public (not unlisted or private) for hosted platforms.

mainEntity.name: What's the optimal video length for upsell campaigns?

acceptedAnswer.text: Keep videos under 60 seconds for best engagement. Videos over 90 seconds tend to have lower conversion rates.

mainEntity.name: How does AI video generation work?

acceptedAnswer.text: Simply provide your Shopify product URL, and our AI automatically extracts product information to generate a professional video. You can customize voice, avatar, and aspect ratio from 240+ options.

mainEntity.name: Which aspect ratio should I choose?

acceptedAnswer.text: Use 16:9 for desktop and product demos, 9:16 for mobile and social media style content, and 1:1 as a universal format that works everywhere.
